attributes.action: Change the inheritance tax proposed on private pensions!
attributes.additional_details: Because people save for themselves and family! I was always ensured that if anyone died before their 75th birthday it would go to said beneficiary on death tax free.
attributes.background: Reverse this unfair tax it’s not fair on pensioners who have saved all their working lives!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700306
